layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x42
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x42
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x26
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x26 [color=#000080]
        LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x26 [border: (3px solid #000080) none (3px solid #000080)]
          LayoutText {#text} at (3,3) size 273x19
            text run at (3,3) width 273: "This box should be open ended at the right."
